stories.title: Extremists Flourishing Behind Well-Built Websites Built on Open Source Tech

stories.text:
The developer guide has been updated with details [1], and you can select the new architecture when creating a Lambda function through the AWS Console. We'll likely see an official statement from AWS soon.

[1]: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/foundation-arch.html
stories.title: AWS Lambda now supports ARM64 architecture

stories.text: Hi everyone - I had this discussion with a good friend of mine today - with almost everything becoming accessible with REST API including human labour (Scale, Mechanical Turk) what is the most missing or crazy API service you would love to use but it is just not there?
stories.title: Ask HN: What is the most missing/crazy API service?
